scripts.compile_commands_json: node-gyp configure -- -f compile_commands_json && ((move /Y Release\compile_commands.json compile_commands.json && rd Release) || (mv Debug/compile_commands.json compile_commands.json && rm -r Debug))
scripts.download: (mkdir download || echo ok) && npm run get-url && set /p URL=<download/url.txt && (call curl -s -L -o download/llama.cpp.zip ^%URL^%.zip || curl -s -L -o download/llama.cpp.tar.gz "$(cat download/url.txt).tar.gz")
scripts.extract: ((rd /s /q llama.cpp || echo ok) && (powershell -command "Expand-Archive download/llama.cpp.zip -DestinationPath download") && (move download\llama.cpp-* llama.cpp) && rd /s /q download) || ((rm -rf llama.cpp || echo ok) && tar -x -C download -f download/llama.cpp.tar.gz && mv download/llama.cpp-* llama.cpp)
scripts.install: npm run download && npm run extract && npm run configure && npm run build
